attributes.action: Private Finance Initiative (PFI) and Public Private Partnerships (PPP) Revenue Tax
attributes.additional_details: We the people call on the Government to bring forward a direct tax on PFI and PPP revenue to ensure a fairer share of profits for the nation, and that profits from PFI and PPP activities are subject to a corporation tax ring fence so that any profits from these activities cannot be reduced by any losses or other tax reliefs from other business activities.
